text: Elizabeth Hay may refer to: *Elizabeth Hay (novelist) (born 1951), Canadian writer * Elizabeth Monroe Hay, full name of Eliza Monroe Hay (1786–1840) *Elizabeth Wellesley, Duchess of Wellington (1820–1904), née Lady Elizabeth Hay, British peer *Elizabeth Hay, Countess of Erroll (1801–1856), wife to the Earl of Erroll *Betty Hay (1927–2007), American biologist ==See also== *Liz Hayes (born 1956), Australian television presenter
title: Elizabeth Hay
